Cleaned_Event: Christianity becomes official religion of Roman Empire (and thus all of Europe)
China is unified by the Sui Dynasty
Venice becomes independent from Eastern Roman Empire
Baghdad founded; becomes center of learning during Islamic Golden Age
Kingdom of England established by Æthelstan
Yuan Dynasty established in China by Kublai Khan
Birth of Leonardo da Vinci; Renaissance begins
Birth of Isaac Newton; start of the Enlightenment
Napoleon sells Louisiana Territory to USA
Einstein creates E=mc²; basis for atomic energy
Pentagon Papers leaked; leads to US withdrawal from Vietnam
Israeli troops withdraw from southern Lebanon
Curiosity rover takes selfie and finds ancient water streambed on Mars
UK votes to leave the EU; beginning of Brexit
